import { Container } from "shards-react"; import { Row, Col, Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardImg, CardBody, CardFooter, Button } from "shards-react"; import Head from "next/head"; import FA from "react-fontawesome"; // Layout import Layout from "../components/Layout"; const ExamTopics = props => ( Exam Topics | CXC Spanish Online Home Exam Topics

Exam Topics

The syllabus topics are designed to test candidates' ability to understanding both written and spoken Spanish, and their ability to respond to a wide range of situations/ scenarios and reading passages in Spanish. in this section, we will take a look at all the sections on the Paper 1 and 2 CSEC exam.

Paper II Layout
Section I
  • Directed Situations


Section II
  • Letter Writing
  • Composition
Section III
  • Contextual Announcements
  • Contextual Dialogue

Section IV
  • Reading Comprehension
Paper I - Multiple Choice
Paper III - Orals
 ); export default ExamTopics;
